serviceNames.description: A list of services that the user should be enrolled for. To create a test user with no services, leave the list empty.

oneOf.description: Generates a Corporation Tax Unique Taxpayer Reference (CTUTR), a Company Registration Number (CRN) and enrols the user for Corporation Tax.
Generates an Employer Reference and enrols the user for PAYE for Employers.
Generates a VAT Registration Number and enrols the user for Submit VAT Returns.
Generates a National Insurance number and enrols the user for National Insurance.
Generates a Self Assessment UTR and enrols the user for Self Assessment.
Generates a National Insurance number and a Making Tax Digital Income Tax ID and enrols the user for Making Tax Digital Income Tax.
Generates a VAT Registration Number and a date of registration for VAT and enrols the user for Making Tax Digital VAT.
Generates a LISA Manager Reference Number and enrols the user for Lifetime ISA.
Generates a Secure Electronic Transfer Reference Number and enrols the user for HMRC Secure Electronic Transfer.
Generates a Pension Scheme Administrator Identifier and enrols the user for Relief at Source.
Generates an EORI number and enrols the user for Customs Services.
Generates an EORI number and enrols the user for Goods Vehicle Movements.
Generates an EORI number and enrols the user for Safety and Security.
Generates an EORI number and enrols the user for Common Transit Convention Traders.
